lead_paragraph: Chicago midfielder Cuauhtemoc Blanco scored one goal and helped set up another, and Houston midfielder Dwayne DeRosario snapped a tie with a penalty kick to give the M.L.S. All-Stars a 3-2 victory in Toronto over the English Premier League team West Ham United.
